thread.title: Apple investors hope for stock boost
thread.title_full: Apple investors hope for stock boost

title: Apple investors hope for stock boost
text: Apple investors hope for stock boost AP | Sep 9, 2015, 11.26 PM IST RELATED Apple investors are hoping that new iPhones and other products will boost the company's stock. Apple's stock has fallen as investors fret over whether the company can duplicate the phenomenal sales growth it saw after introducing last year's iPhone 6 and 6 Plus. In a note to clients, FBR Capital Markets analyst Daniel Ives says the event is critical "for Apple to help turn the negative investor tide, and help lay out its growth vision for the next year." Analyst Amit Daryanani of RBC Capital Markets says the announcements at the event should be "a positive catalyst" for Apple shares. But Maynard Um of Wells Fargo Securities says many investors already have "low expectations." Um says this year's iPhones aren't expected to be dramatically different from last year's models. http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/followceleb.cms?alias=iPhone,iPad Pro,Apple's Stock,Apple Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
